body: Well I thought my cake was on the 6 but I guess not but I've been with OCN for 2 years now and its been good two years with OCN, don't know if I'll be staying though as I've been asked to do stuff with people on other servers but for all my friends thanks for being my friend and being there for me! I will never forget you. Love you a lot. Some things about me, I'm 15 and in highschool obviously and I won't be as active because I play football and basketball for my school. Ask me anything, I might ask my friends to put quotes sice this might be my last AMA but yeah! Ask me anything. And also think you for the people who posted on my thread about my grandma who passed away two years ago, you will not be forgotten either. (I basically copied everything to here but it says it all I don't if ill be staying)

title: AMA 2 year's - Legoman2302
